column1: BUSINESS OVERVIEW CANVAS - Business Now by Loud Legacy
One-page template to document your business model clearly
Instructions: Complete each section. Keep answers brief and specific.

column3: We help SaaS companies reduce churn

column1: Describe your core offering in 2-3 sentences
